answers.answer: I starterd at almost at 36 weeks , I started just takin 3 1000mg orally and then I also started doing 1 vaginally at night before bed . And now I'm 1cm dilated and my cervix is thinned out . I'm also doing exercises to gety little guy to drop. I would say start them now , they deff help .
Ok and have you had any side effects from them
No not at all . My doctor said they sometimes cause diarrhea but I haven't had any problems .
Truthfully idtake diarrhea over another c-section anyday:-)

I haven't had a c-section and don't want one. I was induced with my frist at 38 weeks bc they were concerned he was getting to big . So I'm hoping I can go into labor this time but I not I'm being induced again at 39 weeks .

question: So im 35 weeks 2 days i have two boys that were both c-sections my first due to preeclampsia my second because the hospital would not do v-bacs i went into labor with my second the day of the scheduled c-section my water broke by itsself and all :-) i was 6 cts when they took me back to do the c-section and this time im really wanting to have my baby natural i found a hospital that will allow it. But my doctor said they will give me a c-section date and if i go into labor before said date they will allow the v-vac if not c-section now my question is should I start taking like that epo that everyone is talking about to try to go into labor myself or just wait and see what happens or what and if i should try epo when should i start and how much should i take
title: opinions please:-)
